column1: G2C: A Generator-to-Classifier Framework Integrating Multi-Stained Visual Cues for Pathological Glomerulus Classification

column5: Caihong Zeng@Nanjing University School of Medicine
column6: Zhihong Liu@Nanjing University School of Medicine

column1: Pathological glomerulus classification plays a key role in the diagnosis of nephropathy. As the difference between different subcategories is subtle
column2: doctors often refer to slides from different staining methods to make decisions. However
column3: creating correspondence across various stains is labor-intensive
column4: bringing major difficulties in collecting data and training a vision-based algorithm to assist nephropathy diagnosis.
